title: Daily reminder that Elise still has the lowest winrate in the jungle

embed.description: LoL Statistics, Builds, Runes, Masteries, Skill Orders, Counters and Matchups for Elise when played Jungle. Statistics include Elise's Win Rate, Play Rate and Ban Rate. Counters include who Elise Jungle is Strong or Weak Against.

body: Thank you for nerfing her movement speed, Riot.

replies.body: Agreed, although I dont feel its the damage they should bring back, it's the sense of utility I feel they should buff, better ranges, stronger defensive scalings She could use some better health scalings, its the same as Nidalee but her identity is completely different. She doesn't poke and jump in for quick assassinations, she needs to be able to stay in the fight for a bit and get survive another round of cooldowns to assist the team better. Her damage is fine, Her utility and tankiness needs to be greatly improved.

I still remember the massive Elise QQ on old GD.

Not that she doesnt need help atm, it is just funny.

> [{quoted}](name=Matezoide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p7N1XobP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-12T06:11:45.505+0000)
>
> I still remember the massive Elise QQ on old GD.
> 
> Not that she doesnt need help atm, it is just funny.

I rarely play Elise, but its almost unanimous that Elise was Olaf'd.

I think you missed the point of that comment.

He isn't denying that Elise is weak right now, he is simply stating that her current state of balance is exactly what GD begged for to happen to Elise for like a year.

This type of thing tends to happen to champions when riot gives in to the community's QQ and unleashes the nerf bat.
Elise doesn't have to belong in the jungle, in fact she shouldn't be in the jungle

Isn't her low w/l because of her really high skill cap? I haven't played her so I wouldn't know, but timing that spider jump and the narrow skill shot cocoon look hard. They make her a fair threat, just hard to use I'd imagine.

> [{quoted}](name=Perfect Blue,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p7N1XobP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-12T08:31:55.225+0000)
>
> Isn't her low w/l because of her really high skill cap? I haven't played her so I wouldn't know, but timing that spider jump and the narrow skill shot cocoon look hard. They make her a fair threat, just hard to use I'd imagine.

The pros don't find her good either and high skill cap doesn't matter much to them.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p7N1XobP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-12T16:18:00.973+0000)
>
> The pros don't find her good either and high skill cap doesn't matter much to them.

They used her last season before the tank meta and brutal new jungle came out and I think it's more to do with consistency than potential.

> [{quoted}](name=Perfect Blue,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p7N1XobP,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-12T22:18:52.121+0000)
>
> They used her last season before the tank meta and brutal new jungle came out and I think it's more to do with consistency than potential.

The jungle is honestly quite kind on her imo. She still has fantastic clears and excellent sustain which is perfect for season 5 - the tough jungle should have been a buff to her considering how many other junglers struggled initially. But she hasn't been used all season, even when Jarvan, Vi and Lee were the meta junglers. I really think she's just flat out bad.

> [{quoted}](name=Perfect Blue,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p7N1XobP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-12T08:31:55.225+0000)
>
> Isn't her low w/l because of her really high skill cap? I haven't played her so I wouldn't know, but timing that spider jump and the narrow skill shot cocoon look hard. They make her a fair threat, just hard to use I'd imagine.

She used to have one of the highest winrates. Now shes garbage, that's why her winrate is so low.
Sad that riot probably wont reply to this thread, like every other elise thread >..>.

"Thank you for *buffing* her movement speed"

That aside, she needs some straight up defensive buffs. Her damage is fine, but she needs more tank stats in spider form

I know only one of my friends who can play her succsessfull. And he carry with her, because Elise shred tanks with % dmg. 

Remember she is hard to learn
Daily reminder that no one cares about this overpowered champion.
